examples.example: 多学习一些知识总是有用的，它能在很多时候帮助我们解决问题。

translate.english: Learning more knowledge is always useful, and it can help us solve problems at many times.

examples.example: 掌握一些生活小窍门是非常有用的，能让我们的日常生活更加便捷和美好。

translate.english: Mastering some small life tips is very useful, which can make our daily life more convenient and beautiful.

examples.example: 慷慨无私的分享自己的经验是非常有用的，那会让别人少走许多弯路。

translate.english: Generous and selfless sharing of one's own experience is very useful, which will enable others to avoid many detours.
